name: kazo-design-mcp
description: Communicate your design intentions to AI assistants with quick sketches and mockups. Create visual wireframes and UI mockups directly in VS Code.

languageModelTools.name: kazo_request_sketch
languageModelTools.description: Ask the user to create a visual sketch or mockup to communicate their design idea. Opens the Kazo Design editor and waits for the user to complete their drawing. Use this when the user is describing a UI, layout, component, or visual concept that would be clearer with a sketch.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Create a design sketch to show the AI what you have in mind
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Request a visual sketch from the user. The user will draw shapes (rectangles, circles, lines, text) to communicate their design idea. Returns SVG and JSON representation of the sketch.

title.description: A short title for the sketch request (e.g., 'Login Page Layout', 'Dashboard Widget')

prompt.description: Instructions or context for what the user should sketch (e.g., 'Please sketch the layout of the navigation bar you described')

languageModelTools.name: kazo_select_option
languageModelTools.description: Present a list of options for the user to choose from. Use this when you need the user to make a choice between multiple alternatives. Can optionally allow the user to reply with a sketch instead.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Choose from a list of options (or reply with a sketch)
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Show a quick pick dialog with options for the user to select. Returns the selected option(s). Set allowSketch=true to let user respond with a visual sketch instead. Response includes responseType ('selection' or 'sketch').

title.description: The title/question to display to the user

options.description: List of options for the user to choose from

placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown in the selection dialog

canSelectMany.description: Allow user to select multiple options (not compatible with allowSketch)

allowSketch.description: Add a 'Reply with sketch' option that opens the Kazo Design editor

sketchPrompt.description: Instructions shown to user if they choose to reply with a sketch

languageModelTools.name: kazo_request_text
languageModelTools.description: Ask the user to enter custom text. Use this when you need free-form text input from the user.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Show an input box for the user to enter text. Returns the entered text.

title.description: The title of the input dialog

prompt.description: Additional prompt or instructions for the user

placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown in the input field

defaultValue.description: Default value pre-filled in the input

languageModelTools.name: kazo_select_file
languageModelTools.description: Ask the user to select a file or folder from their system. Use this when you need a file path from the user.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Show a file picker dialog. Returns the selected file path(s).

title.description: The title of the file picker dialog

languageModelTools.name: kazo_confirm_action
languageModelTools.description: Ask the user to confirm or decline an action. Use this for Yes/No decisions.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Show a confirmation dialog. Returns whether the user confirmed or declined.

languageModelTools.name: kazo_get_capabilities
languageModelTools.description: Get information about what the Kazo Design tool can do, including available shapes, features, output formats, and all available user interaction tools.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Learn what Kazo Design can do
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns information about Kazo Design capabilities including available shapes, features, output formats, and all user interaction tools (sketch, select option, text input, file selection, confirmation).
